TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ComponentSerializationService extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供基底類別，以序列化元件集合或可序列化物件至序列化存放區。

span.span: Provides the base class for serializing a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化的序列化存放區中的一組元件或可序列化的物件。The serializes a set of components or serializable objects into a serialization store. 稍後可以還原序列化存放區。The store can then be deserialized later. 類別不同於其他序列化配置，序列化格式是不透明，並可讓部分序列化的物件。The class differs from other serialization schemes in that the serialization format is opaque, and it allows for partial serialization of objects. 例如，您可以選擇只選取的屬性的物件進行序列化。For example, you can choose to serialize only selected properties for an object. 這個類別是`abstract`。This class is `abstract`. 通常會提供這個類別的具體實作，並將它新增為服務，以其。Typically, a will provide a concrete implementation of this class and add it as a service to its . 這可讓以最適合他們的格式來序列化物件。This allows objects to be serialized in the format best suited for them. 類別取代了介面從.NET Framework 1.0 版中，雖然後者會保留回溯相容性。The class replaces the interface from the .NET Framework version 1.0, although the latter is retained for backward compatibility.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫這個類別中的所有方法。其中某些方法可擲回例外狀況，其對應的主題; 中所述強烈建議衍生類別遵循這些方針，以維護一致性的作業。如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別。

When you inherit from the class, you must override all the methods in this class. Some of these methods were designed to throw exceptions, as documented in their corresponding topics; it is strongly recommended that derived classes follow these guidelines to maintain consistency of operation. For more information, see the class.

abstract member CreateStore : unit -> System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.SerializationStore

span.span: Creates a new .

returns.span: 新建立的序列化存放區。

span.span: A new created serialization store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多個物件可以序列化為相同的序列化存放區中。Multiple objects can be serialized into the same serialization store. 當您完成使用存放區時，您可以呼叫其或方法。When you are finished with the store, you can call its or method. 序列化存放區一旦關閉，可以用於還原序列化，或它可以儲存至資料流。Once closed, a serialization store can be used for deserialization, or it can be saved into a stream. 序列化存放區可以傳遞給任何序列化方法，來建置一整組物件的序列化狀態。The serialization store can be passed to any of the various serializing methods to build up serialization state for a group of objects.

summary.span: 還原序列化指定的存放區，以產生物件集合。

span.span: Deserializes the given store to produce a collection of objects.

span.span: Deserializes the given store to produce a collection of objects.

span.span: A collection of objects created according to the stored state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將還原序列化`store`產生其內所含的物件的集合。This method deserializes `store` to produce a collection of objects contained within it. 物件會還原序列化所序列化的順序相同。Objects are deserialized in the same order in which they were serialized.

span.span: The to deserialize.

param.name: container
param.span: 要加入 物件的容器。

span.span: The container to which objects will be added.

summary.span: 還原序列化指定的 至指定的容器中。

span.span: Deserializes the given to the given container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會還原序列化`store`，但而不是產生新的物件，適用於資料存放區中的一組現有的物件取自提供的容器。The method deserializes `store`, but instead of producing new objects, it applies the data in the store to an existing set of objects that are taken from the provided container. 如此一來，呼叫端可以事先建立物件但其認為適合。As a result, the caller can create in advance an object however it sees fit. 如果物件已還原序列化的狀態，而物件的名稱不在一組現有的物件，就會建立新的物件。If an object has a deserialization state and the object is not named in the set of existing objects, a new object will be created. 如果該物件也會實作，它會新增到`container`。If that object also implements , it will be added to `container`. 在容器中的物件必須有名稱和比對的序列化存放區中要使用的現有物件的順序物件的型別。Objects in the container must have names and types that match objects in the serialization store in order for an existing object to be used.

exception.span: 或 為 。

span.span: or is .

exception.span: 不包含序列化容器可以處理之格式的資料。

span.span: does not contain data in a format the serialization container can process.

param.name: store
param.span: ，value 的狀態將序列化至其中。

span.span: The to which the state of value will be serialized.
The object to serialize.

summary.span: 序列化指定的物件，因而能夠產生預設屬性值。

span.span: Serializes the given object, accounting for default property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為透過已實作的標準序列化方法，只會序列化與不同的元件的預設狀態。Standard serialization, as implemented through the method, only serializes values that differ from the component's default state. 這會提供最精簡的序列化機制，但會假設還原序列化期間，將會使用新建立的物件。This provides the most compact serialization mechanism but assumes that a newly created object will be used during deserialization. 如果使用現有的物件，則產生的已還原序列化的物件不保證重複原始狀態的已序列化的物件;包含在序列化期間的預設值的屬性將不會重設回其預設值還原序列化期間。If an existing object is used, the resulting deserialized object is not guaranteed to duplicate the original state of the serialized object; the properties that contained default values during serialization will not be reset back to their defaults during deserialization. 方法不會使用這個快速鍵。The method does not use this shortcut. 好讓還原序列化可以還原所有物件的屬性，不論預設狀態，它會序列化的來源物件的所有屬性。It serializes all properties of the source object so that deserialization can restore all the object's properties, regardless of default state. 因為可能會變更的順序在集合中的構成項目，是特別適用於序列化集合，這個方法。This method is particularly useful for serializing collections, because the order of the constituent items within the collection can change. 在此情況下，最安全的程序來還原整個集合的原始狀態是以其原始的屬性值覆寫的所有項目。In this circumstance, the safest process to restore the original state of the entire collection is to overwrite all the items with all their original property values.

exception.span: 或 為 。

span.span: is closed, or is not a supported type of serialization store.

exception.span: 請使用 傳回的存放區。

span.span: Use a store returned by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以多次叫用來建置一份已序列化的序列化存放區中的成員相同的物件。The method can be invoked multiple times for the same object to build up a list of serialized members within the serialization store. 一般情況下，該成員應該是屬性或事件。In general, the member should be a property or an event.

param.name: store

span.span: The to which the state of member will be serialized.
The object to which member is attached.
The member to serialize.

summary.span: 用預設屬性值序列化指定物件上的指定成員。

span.span: Serializes the given member on the given object, accounting for the default property value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會序列化`member`上`owningObject`，即使`member`包含預設屬性值。The method serializes the `member` on `owningObject`, even if `member` contains the default property value. 請注意，對於某些成員，包含預設值，並將相同的值的設定還原至該成員不同的概念。Note that for some members, containing the default value and restoring the setting of the same value to the member are different concepts. 比方說，如果屬性會繼承它的值從父物件時未不設定任何本機的值，設定至屬性的值可能無法預期。For example, if a property inherits its value from a parent object when no local value is set, setting the value back to the property may not be what is desired. 方法會將此納入帳戶，並會在此情況下清除屬性的狀態。The method takes this into account and would clear the state of the property in this case.

exception.span: 或 為 。
